results.name: Minor Impairment
results.effect: Target is momentarily staggered, -1 to next check/attack.

results.name: Moderate Impairment
results.effect: Target drops their weapon, or is knocked prone, or takes -2 to next check/attack.

results.name: Severe Impairment
results.effect: Target takes a lasting injury (e.g., sprained ankle, -10ft speed for 1d4 rounds), or is disarmed and knocked back.

results.name: Major Injury/Maim
results.effect: Roll on the Limb Incapacitation/Maiming Table.

limbIncapacitationTable.name: Limb Incapacitation/Maiming Table
limbIncapacitationTable.trigger: Targeted limb hit or Major Injury Crit

results.name: Minor Incapacitation
results.effect: Limb is bruised/strained. Attacks/checks using that limb have Disadvantage until healed.

results.name: Moderate Incapacitation
results.effect: Limb is sprained/deep cut. Actions using that limb are impossible until healed. Movement speed halved if leg. Cannot hold shield/weapon if arm.

results.name: Severe Incapacitation
results.effect: Limb is broken/severed (if applicable). Attacks/checks using that limb are impossible. Severe movement penalty or unable to move if leg. Requires significant healing (magic/long rest) or prosthetics.

results.name: Maimed/Severed
results.effect: Limb is permanently maimed or severed. Requires powerful magic or prosthetics to restore full function. Permanent penalties to actions using that limb.
